TNT Mods Addons for Minecraft is an explosive application for lovers of chaos and total destruction in a cubic world. Set your own rules of the game and use all possible tools to destroy and break. Add-ons allow you to blast rocks or challenge other players to a deadly battle using powerful TNT dynamite blocks.

An impressive pack of new TNT blocks will leave no chance for your enemies. The variety of explosive devices is really impressive. Everything is included, from Lava TNT, which leaves a lake of magma, to MOB-TNT, which allows you to create random monsters. In addition, with this application, special explosives will become available to you, which will be useful in the development of mountain deposits. For example, Drill-TNT can dig rock to the very bottom, and Flat-TNT can create flat areas in the mine.

Discover a pack of different types of dynamite with effects that will really blow your mind. A huge number of bombs, grenades and other types of explosives. Create your own atomic or hydrogen bombs, use smoke bombs for attack or defense and blow up any buildings and blocks, including rock. Throw sticks of dynamite a long distance like grenades. Arrange a war with other users, fight off a crowd of monsters or use the new dynamite to extract resources in mines. Watch colorful explosions and impressive destructive power. By installing this application, you can easily extract resources in the mines by throwing bombs there or arrange a battle with your friends on the server. Pick up the right dynamite, ranging from a large TNT that hits 5 blocks, ending with a near-atomic weapon that destroys everything within a 250 block radius. With this application, you will want only one thing - to blow up everything in sight! 

Premium Features:

Huge TNT collections

Regular content updates

Username Generator

Unlimited downloads
